      • setLinkedZone

        public void setLinkedZone(Zone linkedZone)
        Deprecated. 
        The linked zone is used to further constrain the zones returned by performSearch(). If the linked zone is specified the zones returned are zones that are linked to linkedZone.
        Parameters:
        linkedZone - the linked zone
